root.description: A cold, stone cellar is lit in a pale red light.
root.hint: Geralt: "Can't do much while that nekker is in the way."

exit.description: A set of uneven stone #stairs^ staggers upward.
exit.onCheck: Warmth and torch light flow down the #stairs^.

exit.description: Swirling red mist bars entrance to a magical #gate^.
exit.onCheck: The #gate^ lets nothing enter, but pours out malice and desire.

prop.description: A stinking #carcass^ rots before the red #gate^.
prop.onCheck: It is the body of a wolf. It was stabbed several times.
The #boy^ is tall. His arms shield his face. A mess of red hair peeks over them.

prop.description: A #wolf^ stands strong, protecting the #boy^ from a yet more wicked creature.
prop.onCheck: Its ears are down, and its hairs stand on end. It gnashes its teeth when the nekker comes too near.
